title: Bangalore to Madurai Spiritual Journey
overview: Visit the historic Meenakshi Amman Temple and explore the cultural heritage of Madurai, the Athens of the East.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Palace Visit
itinerary.desc: Arrive in Madurai, check-in, and visit the majestic Thirumalai Nayakkar Palace.

itinerary.title: Temple & Departure
itinerary.desc: Early morning darshan at Meenakshi Temple followed by local shopping and departure.
